scripts.prod-docker:clean: docker rmi $(docker images -f dangling=true -q) ; docker rm ship-swift-prod ; docker rmi -f ship-swift-prod
scripts.prod-docker:build: react-scripts build && cp nginx/nginx.conf build/nginx.conf && docker build -t ship-swift-prod -f ./dockerfiles/Dockerfile.prod ./build
scripts.dev-docker:clean: docker rmi $(docker images -f dangling=true -q) ; docker rm ship-swift-dev ; docker rmi -f ship-swift-dev
scripts.proto:order: cd src && cd proto && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=/Users/garygoodger/Repos/shipswift/web-app-react/node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:'/Users/garygoodger/Repos/shipswift/web-app-react/src/proto'  --ts_out=service=grpc-web:'/Users/garygoodger/Repos/shipswift/web-app-react/src/proto'  order_manager.proto
